name: The Revolution
description:
I.	Welcome You In [Produced by: Mpax]
II.	I’m Changed ft. Mehlek Pfisha [Produced by: 2econd Avenue]
III.	Brainwashed ft. Kambino & Yaves [Produced by: J-Luv]
IV.	Fatherhood ft. Jeremiah Bonds [Produced by: G.Roc]
V.	Love Song [Produced by: J-Luv]
VI.	Revolution ft. KAS [Produced by: Steven Sharp]
VII.	The Principle ft. Kelly Kelz [Produced by: J-Luv]
VIII.	We Are United ft. Ryan Horton [Produced by: Open Minds Ent.]
IX.	Renewed [Produced by: Sean Divine]
X.	GAME [Produced by: SuperstarO]
XI.	Heart of Courage ft. Pettidee [Produced by: BMII]
XII.	I’m On ft. Rawsrvnt [Produced by: Swade Beatz]


"A Revolution starts with Eph. 4:23. A daily renewing of your mind and spirit. We a lot of times want to make an impact in our cities, states, countries, etc., and that's great! This album will challenge the believer to come to grips with their daily actions and thoughts. Asking themselves, "Do I have a personal daily relationship with Jesus Christ?" And if you do? PRAISE GOD! If you don't, now is the time to humble yourself, lay down all pride and, submit to Jesus Christ proclaiming he is Lord over your life."

-Lil Prophet
